cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 1 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

privates.name: Basic Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: The YMCA Hostel Single Room is has a Single Bed, Closet, Storage Space, Desk with a Chair and a Mini-Fridge. It is well lit with 2 lights and a clear window to receive plenty of sunlight. Some of our Single Rooms offer Beautiful Harbour Side View.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Basic Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: The YMCA Hostel Double Room is a large room equipped with a Double Bed, Closet, Desk with a chair and a Mini-Fridge. It is well lit with 2 lights in the room with a clear window to receive plenty of sunlight.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 23rd Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 23rd Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
